meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious johnnycakes with butter for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: My grandma makes the best johnnycakes on Sunday mornings.
meanings.sent3: Why did the cornmeal flatbread go to school? To become a smart johnnycakes!
meanings.sent4: The johnnycakes were like little pieces of sunshine on my plate.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked johnnycakes filled the kitchen.

meanings.sent1: Mom served johnnycakes with maple syrup for brunch.
meanings.sent2: The diner down the street serves fluffy johnnycakes for breakfast.
meanings.sent3: Why did the pancake blush? Because it saw the johnnycakes flipping in the pan!
meanings.sent4: The golden brown johnnycakes were a delight to the eyes.
meanings.sent5: The sweet smell of johnnycakes cooking made my stomach growl.

meanings.definition: A type of breakfast food made from cornmeal.
meanings.sent1: I like to start my day with a hearty serving of johnnycakes.
meanings.sent2: The campfire breakfast included johnnycakes cooked over an open flame.
meanings.sent3: Why did the breakfast food break up with the oatmeal? It found a new love in johnnycakes!
meanings.sent4: The johnnycakes were a warm and comforting way to begin the morning.
meanings.sent5: The crunch of the cornmeal in the johnnycakes was satisfying.
